note: I’m attempting to live the life of a modern Taoist, who can only be fulfilled by an unconventional life. Over the years, I’ve enjoyed being a videogame designer, an internet visionary, a filmmaker, a physicist, and a student of taoism and qigong. My day job is running a tiny high tech venture studio with big dreams.
